divs: sighting details1-1-13 0001-0006am 2 red\orange fireball\orbs pulsating\shimmering two differing altitudes(approx 100ft). i was hillside 500 agl above riverside. object appeared eye level then ascended\faded. i'm a former structures mechanic for the airforce 2a773 afsc and lifelong aerospace buff. this was not man made.

Summary: 2 fireball/orbs red/orange hover then ascend slowly/pulsating then fade.
